option.name: originalContent
updatedContent
originalContent
option.value:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?> <androidx.constraintlayout.widget.ConstraintLayout xmlns:android="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res/android" xmlns:app="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res-auto" xmlns:tools="http://schemas.android.com/tools" android:id="@+id/main" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="match_parent" android:padding="24dp" tools:context=".RegisterActivity">
<!-- 标题：注册账号 --> <TextView android:id="@+id/tvRegisterTitle" android:layout_width="0dp" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:text="@string/register_title" android:textSize="24sp" android:textStyle="bold" android:gravity="center" app:layout_constraintTop_toTopOf="parent" app:layout_constraintStart_toStartOf="parent" app:layout_constraintEnd_toEndOf="parent" />
<!-- 用户名输入 --> <com.google.android.material.textfield.TextInputLayout android:id="@+id/tilRegUsername" style="@style/Widget.Material3.TextInputLayout.FilledBox" android:layout_width="0dp" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:hint="@string/login_username_hint" app:boxBackgroundColor="@color/surface_variant_light" app:layout_constraintTop_toBottomOf="@id/tvRegisterTitle" app:layout_constraintStart_toStartOf="parent" app:layout_constraintEnd_toEndOf="parent" android:layout_marginTop="32dp">
<com.google.android.material.textfield.TextInputEditText android:id="@+id/etRegUsername" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:maxLines="1" /> </com.google.android.material.textfield.TextInputLayout>
<!-- 密码输入 --> <com.google.android.material.textfield.TextInputLayout android:id="@+id/tilRegPassword" style="@style/Widget.Material3.TextInputLayout.FilledBox" android:layout_width="0dp" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:hint="@string/login_password_hint" app:endIconMode="password_toggle" app:boxBackgroundColor="@color/surface_variant_light" app:layout_constraintTop_toBottomOf="@id/tilRegUsername" app:layout_constraintStart_toStartOf="parent" app:layout_constraintEnd_toEndOf="parent" android:layout_marginTop="16dp">
<com.google.android.material.textfield.TextInputEditText android:id="@+id/etRegPassword" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:inputType="textPassword" android:maxLines="1" /> </com.google.android.material.textfield.TextInputLayout>
<!-- 注册按钮（占位） --> <com.google.android.material.button.MaterialButton android:id="@+id/btnDoRegister" style="@style/Widget.Material3.Button" android:layout_width="0dp" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:text="@string/register_button_text" android:textAllCaps="false" android:layout_marginTop="32dp" app:layout_constraintTop_toBottomOf="@id/tilRegPassword" app:layout_constraintStart_toStartOf="parent" app:layout_constraintEnd_toEndOf="parent" android:backgroundTint="@color/brand_primary" android:textColor="@color/brand_on_primary" app:cornerRadius="16dp" />
</androidx.constraintlayout.widget.ConstraintLayout>

option.name: updatedContent
option.value:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?> <androidx.constraintlayout.widget.ConstraintLayout xmlns:android="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res/android" xmlns:app="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res-auto" xmlns:tools="http://schemas.android.com/tools" android:id="@+id/main" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="match_parent" android:padding="24dp" tools:context=".RegisterActivity">
<!-- 标题：注册账号，与登录页字号稍小但保持粗体 --> <TextView android:id="@+id/tvRegisterTitle" android:layout_width="0dp" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:text="@string/register_title" android:textSize="26sp" android:textStyle="bold" android:gravity="center" android:textColor="?attr/colorOnBackground" app:layout_constraintTop_toTopOf="parent" app:layout_constraintStart_toStartOf="parent" app:layout_constraintEnd_toEndOf="parent" />
<!-- 用户名输入框 --> <com.google.android.material.textfield.TextInputLayout android:id="@+id/tilRegUsername" style="@style/Widget.Material3.TextInputLayout.FilledBox" android:layout_width="0dp" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:hint="@string/login_username_hint" app:boxBackgroundColor="@color/surface_variant_light" app:boxCornerRadiusTopStart="12dp" app:boxCornerRadiusTopEnd="12dp" app:boxCornerRadiusBottomStart="12dp" app:boxCornerRadiusBottomEnd="12dp" app:layout_constraintTop_toBottomOf="@id/tvRegisterTitle" app:layout_constraintStart_toStartOf="parent" app:layout_constraintEnd_toEndOf="parent" android:layout_marginTop="36dp">
<com.google.android.material.textfield.TextInputEditText android:id="@+id/etRegUsername" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:inputType="text" android:maxLines="1" /> </com.google.android.material.textfield.TextInputLayout>
<!-- 密码输入框 --> <com.google.android.material.textfield.TextInputLayout android:id="@+id/tilRegPassword" style="@style/Widget.Material3.TextInputLayout.FilledBox" android:layout_width="0dp" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:hint="@string/login_password_hint" app:endIconMode="password_toggle" app:boxBackgroundColor="@color/surface_variant_light" app:boxCornerRadiusTopStart="12dp" app:boxCornerRadiusTopEnd="12dp" app:boxCornerRadiusBottomStart="12dp" app:boxCornerRadiusBottomEnd="12dp" app:layout_constraintTop_toBottomOf="@id/tilRegUsername" app:layout_constraintStart_toStartOf="parent" app:layout_constraintEnd_toEndOf="parent" android:layout_marginTop="16dp">
<com.google.android.material.textfield.TextInputEditText android:id="@+id/etRegPassword" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:inputType="textPassword" android:maxLines="1" /> </com.google.android.material.textfield.TextInputLayout>
<!-- 确认密码输入框 --> <com.google.android.material.textfield.TextInputLayout android:id="@+id/tilRegConfirmPassword" style="@style/Widget.Material3.TextInputLayout.FilledBox" android:layout_width="0dp" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:hint="@string/register_confirm_password_hint" app:endIconMode="password_toggle" app:boxBackgroundColor="@color/surface_variant_light" app:boxCornerRadiusTopStart="12dp" app:boxCornerRadiusTopEnd="12dp" app:boxCornerRadiusBottomStart="12dp" app:boxCornerRadiusBottomEnd="12dp" app:layout_constraintTop_toBottomOf="@id/tilRegPassword" app:layout_constraintStart_toStartOf="parent" app:layout_constraintEnd_toEndOf="parent" android:layout_marginTop="16dp">
<com.google.android.material.textfield.TextInputEditText android:id="@+id/etRegConfirmPassword" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:inputType="textPassword" android:maxLines="1" /> </com.google.android.material.textfield.TextInputLayout>
<!-- 注册按钮 --> <com.google.android.material.button.MaterialButton android:id="@+id/btnDoRegister" style="@style/Widget.Material3.Button" android:layout_width="0dp" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:text="@string/register_button_text" android:textAllCaps="false" android:layout_marginTop="32dp" app:layout_constraintTop_toBottomOf="@id/tilRegConfirmPassword" app:layout_constraintStart_toStartOf="parent" app:layout_constraintEnd_toEndOf="parent" app:cornerRadius="16dp" android:backgroundTint="@color/brand_primary" android:textColor="@color/brand_on_primary" />
<!-- 返回登录入口（点击跳转登录页） --> <TextView android:id="@+id/tvBackToLogin" android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:text="@string/register_back_to_login" android:textSize="14sp" android:textColor="@color/brand_primary" android:layout_marginTop="20dp" app:layout_constraintTop_toBottomOf="@id/btnDoRegister" app:layout_constraintStart_toStartOf="parent" app:layout_constraintEnd_toEndOf="parent" />
</androidx.constraintlayout.widget.ConstraintLayout>

option.name: updatedContent
option.value:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?> <resources> <!-- 夜间模式下的颜色定义 --> <!-- 品牌主色：夜间保持一致，Material3 常见做法是主色不变或稍微降低亮度，这里保持不变以减少突兀 --> <color name="brand_primary">#2455F5</color> <!-- 主色上的文字/Icon 高对比色：在深色模式依旧使用纯白 --> <color name="brand_on_primary">#FFFFFFFF</color>
<!-- 微信品牌色与其前景色：保持官方绿色与白色 --> <color name="wechat_green">#07C160</color> <color name="wechat_on_green">#FFFFFFFF</color>
<!-- 输入框填充底色（深色模式下的 surface variant），选择较深灰蓝提升对比 --> <color name="surface_variant_light">#FF2A3036</color> </resources>

option.name: originalContent
option.value:
<resources> <string name="app_name">TravelMap</string> <!-- 登录注册相关字符串 --> <string name="login_username_hint">用户名</string> <string name="login_password_hint">密码</string> <string name="login_button_text">登录</string> <string name="login_wechat_button_text">微信登录</string> <string name="login_register_entry">还没有账号？注册</string> <string name="register_title">注册账号</string> <string name="register_button_text">注册</string>
<!-- 提示语 --> <string name="toast_input_username">请输入用户名</string> <string name="toast_input_password">请输入密码</string> <string name="toast_login_success">模拟登录成功</string> <string name="toast_wechat_not_ready">暂未集成微信登录，后续请接入微信 SDK</string>
<!-- 保留原有示例字符串 --> <string name="hello_blank_fragment">Hello blank fragment</string> </resources>

option.name: updatedContent
option.value:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?> <resources> <string name="app_name">TravelMap</string> <!-- 登录注册相关字符串 --> <string name="login_username_hint">用户名</string> <string name="login_password_hint">密码</string> <string name="login_button_text">登录</string> <string name="login_wechat_button_text">微信登录</string> <string name="login_register_entry">还没有账号？注册</string> <string name="register_title">注册账号</string> <string name="register_button_text">注册</string> <string name="register_confirm_password_hint">确认密码</string> <string name="register_back_to_login">已有账号？返回登录</string>
<!-- 提示语 --> <string name="toast_input_username">请输入用户名</string> <string name="toast_input_password">请输入密码</string> <string name="toast_input_confirm_password">请再次输入确认密码</string> <string name="toast_password_not_match">两次输入的密码不一致</string> <string name="toast_login_success">模拟登录成功</string> <string name="toast_register_success">模拟注册成功</string> <string name="toast_wechat_not_ready">暂未集成微信登录，后续请接入微信 SDK</string>
<!-- 保留原有示例字符串 --> <string name="hello_blank_fragment">Hello blank fragment</string> </resources>
